q: " I think he'd clear the field. " Indiana Republican Party Chairman Eric Holcomb said in a statement that Indiana is fortunate to be the home of GOP " rising stars " like Mike Pence . " The Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act would deny any family planning funds under title X from going to Planned Parenthood or other organizations that perform abortions, " said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor. It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars. key given to Michael Vick . Richard Hunter showed the council a picture of his black pit bull Mel, used by Michael Vick as a bait dog to train fighting dogs before he was seized by authorities. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city`` rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city.''
